version_description:
• Added iPad support
• Improved Questions By User section
• Minor UI improvements

- Added landscape support for tablets
- Fixed List View bug for flagged Mock questions

- Added zoom image feature
- Added Notification Counter
- Added auto refresh of flagged questions
- Added dynamic timeout handling
- Added new HTML tags to render
- Minor text alignment adjustments
- Fixed study group update
- Fixed off line mode list view bug
- Fixed study group update bug

- Indent formatting improvements
- Added colour support
- Notification handling improvements
- Added ability to delete all flagged questions
- Resolved iOS 9 crash issues
- Minor bug fixes

- Added like/dislike feature for comments
- Updated notification counter implementation
- UI improvements

- Added score to practice category
- Added question flag option to active mocks
- minor UI updates
- Bug fixes

- updated loading screen
- resolved comments crash bug

- Added Rate App option
- Added Certificates for categories and mocks
- Improved table formatting
- Added user data synchronization upon login
- Minor bug fixes
